title: Headhunter akali sale?
body: Is the new akali skin gonna have a sale for the first couple of days?? And how much will it be?

replies.body:
Hello,

Headhunter Akali will be 1350 RP and includes: 

New model and texture
New sound effects
New particles
New recall animation 
**
Note: Akali will be available next or later in the current patch - and she will be priced 975 RP for a few days and then turn back to 1350
**


Cheers
I've heard some people say that it'll be on sale for 975 RP, but I can't confirm this.
